basics.name: Shashank
basics.headline: B.Tech Biotechnology & Bioinformatics Student | AI, ML, DS & Software Engineering Enthusiast
basics.summary: Final-year Biotechnology & Bioinformatics undergraduate at IIT Hyderabad with 2+ years of hands-on experience in AI/ML and genomic data analysis. Proven track record of developing production-grade ML pipelines that improved accuracy by 12% and reduced processing time by 60%. Published researcher in computational biology with expertise in deep learning architectures for protein sequence analysis. Skilled in full-stack development, MLOps, and building scalable bioinformatics solutions. Strong foundation in data structures, algorithms, and research-driven problem solving.

achievements: Developed an end-to-end ML pipeline for genomic feature extraction processing 10,000+ protein sequences using Python, PyTorch, and Biopython.
Improved protein family classifier accuracy from 76% to 88% by optimizing CNN architectures and implementing advanced data augmentation.
Automated preprocessing workflow for protein sequences, reducing manual processing time by 60% and eliminating human errors.
Collaborated with 3 PhD researchers to validate model predictions against known biological functions, achieving 92% concordance.
Built interactive Streamlit dashboard for real-time monitoring of training metrics, dataset statistics, and model performance.
Implemented MLOps best practices including experiment tracking with Weights & Biases and model versioning.
Conducted research on evolutionary patterns in protein families using Hidden Markov Models (HMMs) with 500+ sequences.
Implemented a custom alignment scoring algorithm that improved local alignment accuracy by 18% compared to baseline.
Optimized large-scale dataset processing using Python multiprocessing, reducing computation time from 6 hours to 45 minutes.
Contributed to manuscript preparation with publication-ready visualizations using Matplotlib, Seaborn, and Plotly.
Presented findings at IIT Hyderabad's Annual Research Symposium to an audience of 100+ researchers.
Developing transformer-based models for RNA secondary structure prediction with 89% accuracy on benchmark datasets.
Building automated data pipelines for processing genomic sequences from public databases (NCBI, Ensembl).
Implementing attention mechanisms to identify functionally important regions in genetic sequences.
Built 8+ full-stack features for an internal analytics dashboard serving 200+ users using React, TailwindCSS, and FastAPI.
Designed and implemented RESTful APIs with JWT-based authentication and role-based access control (RBAC).
Refactored legacy Python codebase improving API response time by 40% and reducing memory usage by 25%.
Wrote comprehensive unit and integration tests using Pytest and Jest, achieving 85% code coverage.
Implemented CI/CD pipeline using GitHub Actions, reducing deployment time from 2 hours to 15 minutes.
Collaborated with cross-functional team of 6 developers using Agile methodologies (2-week sprints).

projects.name: Protein Sequence Classifier
projects.description: Deep learning classifier for categorizing protein sequences into functional families using 1D CNN architecture.
features: Custom 1D convolutional layers optimized for variable-length biological sequences
Achieved 88% accuracy on Swiss-Prot dataset with 15,000+ annotated sequences
Integrated Grad-CAM visualization for model interpretability and motif discovery
Implemented data augmentation techniques specific to protein sequences (reversals, mutations)
Deployed model API using FastAPI with Docker containerization
projects.highlights: Featured in IIT Hyderabad Tech Showcase 2024

projects.name: Genome Variant Detection Pipeline
projects.description: End-to-end bioinformatics pipeline for identifying and classifying genomic variants from NGS data.
features: Automated variant calling from BAM files using GATK best practices
ML-based variant classification (SNPs, indels) with 94% precision
Parallel processing of multiple samples using multiprocessing (5x speedup)
Integration with public databases (dbSNP, ClinVar) for variant annotation
Generated comprehensive HTML reports with interactive visualizations

projects.name: Resume Chatbot with RAG
projects.description: Intelligent chatbot using Retrieval-Augmented Generation to answer questions about resume content with context-aware responses.
features: Vector database (ChromaDB) for efficient semantic search across resume sections
Custom prompt engineering for accurate, context-aware responses
Real-time streaming responses with typing indicators for better UX
Dark/light theme toggle with persistent user preferences
Fully responsive design optimized for mobile and desktop
Deployed on Vercel with FastAPI backend on Railway

projects.name: AI-Powered Notes Summarizer
projects.description: NLP application for automatically summarizing academic lecture notes and research papers using transformer models.
features: Fine-tuned BART model on academic text achieving 0.42 ROUGE-L score
Support for PDF, DOCX, and plain text input formats
Extractive and abstractive summarization modes with adjustable compression ratios
Batch processing capability for multiple documents
Clean web interface built with React for easy file uploads and downloads

projects.name: CodeTrack - Coding Progress Tracker
projects.description: Full-stack web application for tracking coding practice across multiple platforms (LeetCode, Codeforces, CodeChef).
features: User authentication with JWT and secure password hashing (bcrypt)
RESTful API for CRUD operations on problem-solving statistics
Interactive data visualizations showing progress trends and topic distribution
Automated data fetching from competitive programming platforms using web scraping
Responsive dashboard with daily streak tracking and goal setting features

achievements: Department Topper (Bioinformatics coursework)
ML Coursework Grade: A+

publications.title: CNN Approaches for Protein Sequence Classification
publications.summary: Explores deep learning approaches for protein structure prediction and sequence family classification.

responsibilities: Mentor 25+ juniors in Data Structures, Algorithms, and competitive programming
Conduct weekly coding contests with 50+ participants and prepare problem sets
Delivered 10+ workshops on Python, C++, dynamic programming, and graph algorithms
Created educational content and curated learning resources for club members
Organized 5 technical workshops on machine learning fundamentals and PyTorch
Collaborated on hackathon projects mentoring teams in AI/ML implementations
Contributed to GDSC blog with tutorials on deep learning and computer vision

achievements: Led cross-functional team of 5 students developing ML application for disease prediction from genomic data
Managed agile development process with 2-week sprints, daily standups, and retrospectives
Conducted code reviews ensuring adherence to best practices and maintaining code quality
Successfully delivered project 2 weeks ahead of schedule, presented to faculty panel
Project achieved 86% prediction accuracy and received Best Project Award in course
Represented department at university open houses and recruitment events
Assisted in organizing departmental symposium with 200+ attendees
Mentored incoming students during orientation and throughout first semester

awards.title: Smart India Hackathon 2024 - Grand Finalist
awards.description: Selected as one of 36 finalist teams out of 15,000+ participating teams nationwide. Developed AI-powered healthcare solution for rural areas.
awards.issuer: Ministry of Education, Government of India

awards.title: Top 1% - Kaggle Bioinformatics Competition
awards.description: Ranked in top 1% (42/4200 participants) in protein structure prediction challenge using deep learning techniques.

awards.title: Best Project Award - Machine Learning Course
awards.description: Awarded for developing a novel approach to genomic variant classification with 86% accuracy.

awards.title: Dean's List
awards.description: Recognized for academic excellence with GPA in top 10% of the department.

awards.title: HackTheGenome 2024 - Second Place
awards.description: Built a genomic data visualization platform in 24-hour hackathon. Won prize among 50+ teams.
